mapper.sql: id, title, content, head_url, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select id, title, content, headUrl from community where del = 0
select title, content, headUrl from community where del = 0 and id = #{id}
select COUNT(id) from community where del = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into "community"
id,
title,
content,
head_url,
create_time,
update_time,

title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

head_url = #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
